title: Jasmine Yarbrough reveals husband Karl Stefanovic serenades her
text:
They tied the knot in a romantic ceremony in Cabo, Mexico, in December.

And on Tuesday, Jasmine Yarbrough revealed that husband Karl Stefanovic likes to serenade her as a 'morning wake up call.'

The 35-year-old shoe designer took to Instagram to share a hilarious Animoji video of the former Today star singing her Simply Red's If You Don't Know Me By Now.

How romantic! Jasmine Yarbrough revealed on Tuesday that husband Karl Stefanovic serenades her with a husky rendition of a Simply Red hit as her 'morning wake up call'

Sharing the cute video on her Instagram, Jasmine wrote: 'My morning wake up call.'

In the video, Karl puts on a husky voice as he does his best to hit the right notes.

As his voice rings out, the Animoji - a character created by iPhone users to represent themselves - sings along on the screen.

What a character! The 45-year-old presenter made his wife laugh with the hilarious singing Animoji video

Friends and fans commented on Jasmine's hilarious post, but while some social media users found the video 'brilliant', others branded the singing head 'terrifying'.

Another Instagram user wrote: 'The real Masked Singer', referring to Monday's finale of the popular singing competition.

Karl himself joined in on the fun, writing: 'That's not me.'

Cheeky! Friends and fans commented on Jasmine's hilarious post, while Karl remarked: 'That's not me'

The TV personality tied the knot with Jasmine in a lavish Mexican wedding ceremony in December.

And earlier this year, fans were speculating over whether Jasmine is expecting her first child.

The chatter began after she shared a photo to Instagram in which she appeared to be hiding her tummy. But Jasmine's publicist later denied the baby rumours.
description: They tied the knot in a romantic ceremony in Cabo, Mexico, in December.
authors: Jess Bell For Daily Mail Australia
